title: How to Use a Stamp Positioner

steps.headline: Purchase a stamp positioner if you don't already have one.
steps.description: It looks like an angled ruler.

steps.headline: Place the stamp positioner over the corner of a piece of tracing paper.
steps.description: Fit the corner neatly into the right angled corner of the stamp positioner. Stamp the image onto the tracing paper. Check that the edges of the stamp will also fit properly into the right angled corner of the stamp positioner, otherwise you might need to use a smaller stamp.

steps.headline: Remove the stamp.
steps.description: You will now see the stamp image on the corner of the tracing paper.

steps.headline: Move the image on the tracing paper so that it sits exactly where you want it to be on the craft project.
Place the stamp positioner exactly in place on the tracing paper, so that the corner of the tracing paper is sitting in the right angled corner of the stamp positioner.
Gently slide the tracing paper out from under the stamp positioner.
steps.description: Take care not to remove the exact positioning of the stamp positioner.

steps.headline: Place the stamp in the right angled corner of the stamp and stamp.
steps.description: The image that it produces should be exactly in place where you want it on the project medium.

text: Purchase a stamp positioner if you don't already have one. It looks like an angled ruler. Place the stamp positioner over the corner of a piece of tracing paper. Fit the corner neatly into the right angled corner of the stamp positioner. Stamp the image onto the tracing paper. Check that the edges of the stamp will also fit properly into the right angled corner of the stamp positioner, otherwise you might need to use a smaller stamp. Remove the stamp. You will now see the stamp image on the corner of the tracing paper. Move the image on the tracing paper so that it sits exactly where you want it to be on the craft project.  Place the stamp positioner exactly in place on the tracing paper, so that the corner of the tracing paper is sitting in the right angled corner of the stamp positioner.  Gently slide the tracing paper out from under the stamp positioner. Take care not to remove the exact positioning of the stamp positioner. Place the stamp in the right angled corner of the stamp and stamp. The image that it produces should be exactly in place where you want it on the project medium.
